text: Can you beat Margate in the tutorial of
Elen Rain Night Rain? Well, duh. Of
course you can, silly. At the end of the
tutorial, you will face Marget alongside
the Duchess. You will only get two tries
as the game will progress if you die a
second time. You can get infinite tries
though by quitting to the main menu,
respawning, and running back to the
sight of grace for healing. When you
fight him, make sure to have Roger's
raper in your hand for the free
Glintstone fallank and freeze his ass
with the Kolkatar. Once he's called,
stand behind him so he focuses on the
Duchess and just poke his ass to death.
Make sure to save your ultimate in the
case the Duchess dies to revive her.
Once you finally win, you will be able
to pull Alon Kennedy by sitting on a
chair and you will be rewarded with a
very strong relic of a questionable
name. LS market.
